column2: 3.7]@"Canfem breast prosthesis is handcrafted from soft cotton fabric and is non-allergenic. It is made to give you the perfect fit and comfort. It is best for breast cancer patients and survivors who have undergone full breast removal (mastectomy). The technology of this prosthesis has been approved by AIIMS and Tata Memorial Hospital.Instructions-1. Hand wash only.2. Do not tumble dry.3. Do not bleach or iron.4. Avoid excessive pulling or squeezing of the product. It can damage the product permanently.5. Store with care.

column1: Note: Clovia along with Canfem team has brought Mastectomy bras & Prosthesis at nominal costs.We only recover our costs and make no profits from this."@['https://image.clovia.com/media/images/clovia-picture-ac0067p99-361915.jpg'
